title: U.S. fire statistics : fire department responses , by type of call 2018
summary: This statistic shows the total Number of Type calls call in 2018 , based on their Number of False_alarms calls responded in U.S. All_other_responses_(smoke_scares_lock-outs_etc.)
In 2018 , Medical_aid_responses_(ambulance_EMS_rescue) had a market Number of more than 41 million .

data.Type of call: All other responses (smoke scares lock-outs etc.)
Other hazardous responses (arcing wires bomb removal etc.)

gold: This statistic shows total number of calls responded by fire departments of the United States in 2018 . In 2018 , U.S. fire departments responded to 2,889,000 false alarms . This was an increase of 13 % from the previous year .
